mapper.sql: SELECT tno, leader, name, description, reg_date, up_date FROM team
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team (leader, name, description, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{leader}, #{name}, #{description}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, up_date = now() WHERE tno = #{tno} and leader = #{leader}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team t JOIN member m ON t.tno = m.tno WHERE m.id = #{id}
